entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
